definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Even before that, they treaded lightly in Basra.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在此以前，他们就轻易处理巴士拉。

sentences.english: In Basra, there is little mood to spread the wealth around.
sentences.chinese: 在巴士拉，可没什么心情去四处散财。

sentences.english: In the southern city of Basra, they faced artillery and machine-gun fire.
sentences.chinese: 在南部城市巴士拉，他们遭遇了火炮和机枪火力。

sentences.english: He then went on to Basra to meet British troops.
sentences.chinese: 他接着去到了巴士拉并会见了英国士兵。

sentences.english: In the southern city of Basra, they faced artillery and machine-gun fire.
sentences.chinese: 在南部城市巴士拉，遭遇了火炮和机枪火力。

definition: Tabriz city in northwest Iran, capital of Iranian East Azerbaijan
Najaf (city in Iraq, a Shia holy city)
Tripoli, capital of Libya/Tripoli, city in north Lebanon
